tool_description: Creates channel-specific survey links and configurations for distribution across email, SMS, web portals, and mobile apps with customizable parameters for each channel.

channels.description: List of distribution channels to create

survey_title.description: Title of the survey for channel customization

error_messages: Invalid survey_id: Survey ID must be a non-empty string with only alphanumeric characters and underscores.
Unsupported channel: Supported channels are [email, sms, web_portal, mobile_app, qr_code].
Invalid expiration_date: Must be a future date in ISO 8601 format.
Empty survey_title: Survey title cannot be empty.
Channel limit exceeded: Maximum 10 channels allowed per survey.
usage: Provide survey_id, channels array, survey_title, and expiration_date. Optionally set anonymous_mode. Returns channel-specific URLs and configuration details.
